articles.title: Democrats’ Failures So Far on Tax Policy Spur Frustration in Party
articles.type: President Biden has been unable to turn slim congressional majorities into tax increases on high-income households and corporations. Democrats likely will compete in the midterms having barely budged tax policy in their direction.856 min read

articles.title: Senate Advances $280 Billion Bill Subsidizing Chip Manufacturing, Technology

articles.title: China Targeted Fed to Build Informant Network, Probe Says
articles.type: The investigation by Senate Republicans found that the decadelong effort included threatening to imprison a Fed economist during a trip to Shanghai unless he agreed to provide nonpublic economic data.16 min read
